title: Standardize the API calls required from admin UI
description: The API required by the Admin UI is neither documented nor tested. It is largely UI centric. We need to standardize the calls and write tests for the API.

comments.author: Upayavira
comments.content: Presumably you are referring to Zookeeper APIs? Much of the UI consumes standard Solr APIs - it is particularly in the ZK area that it diverges and it seems the UI and the API were created in consort.
